name: busy spider
detailed_description:
Lonely fight
You are the only one in the game, not only need to ensure the safety of your territory, but also need to resist the tide of enemies, and seize the opportunity to attack in order to win the final victory.
Invigorating battle
3D omnidirectional viewing angle, immersive gaming experience, unleash true self in a drastic battle.
Wisdom and courageIn
the fierce battle, use the terrain, use the tactics, hide yourself in the jungle, defeat the enemy, and win the fruits of victory.
about_the_game:
Lonely fight
You are the only one in the game, not only need to ensure the safety of your territory, but also need to resist the tide of enemies, and seize the opportunity to attack in order to win the final victory.
Invigorating battle
3D omnidirectional viewing angle, immersive gaming experience, unleash true self in a drastic battle.
Wisdom and courageIn
the fierce battle, use the terrain, use the tactics, hide yourself in the jungle, defeat the enemy, and win the fruits of victory.
short_description: "BUSY SPIDER" is a 3D shooting strategy action game launched by Yousoi Co.,Ltd. It is specially developed for game consoles and mainframes. It adopts full-view mode. Players are in constant and intense battles, using wisdom to defeat enemies. To accomplish this, you must rely on yourself alone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
